name: Sparkling Peach Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 (750', 'unit': 'ml) bottle', 'name': 'rosecco, well chilled'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': None, 'name': 'peaches, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'ointreau liqueur'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'limes, thinly sliced, divided', 'name': 'limes, thinly sliced, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'mint leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1-inch) piece fresh', 'name': 'ginger, finely grated'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'sparkling water, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'mint leaves for garnish (optional)'}
steps: Early in the day, refrigerate prosecco. Combine peach slices, Cointreau, half of lime slices, mint leaves, and grated ginger in a container with a lid. Refrigerate at least 6 hours, making sure peaches are submerged in liquid.. When ready to serve, pour peach mixture into a large serving pitcher and add prosecco. Stir briefly to combine.. Place some of the fruit in each glass, add sangria, and top with 2 ounces sparkling water, or to taste. Garnish with reserved lime slices and additional mint leaves, if desired.

name: Sparkling Mango Pineapple Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'mango juice'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': None, 'name': 'fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': None, 'name': 'mangos - peeled, seeded, and sliced'}, {'quantity': '750mL', 'unit': None, 'name': 'Prosecco'}
steps: Stir pineapple juice, mango juice, pineapple rum, mango rum, chunked pineapple, and mango slices together in a large pitcher. Chill for 2 to 4 hours.. Add Prosecco before serving. Stir and serve cold.

name: Sangria! Sangria!

name: Classic Spanish Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'orange'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'lemon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'lime'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'dry red wine'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar, or to taste'}
steps: Refrigerate orange, lemon, lime, wine, rum, and orange juice until cold.. Slice orange, lemon, and lime into thin rounds. Place in a large glass pitcher. Add rum and sugar. Refrigerate to allow flavors to blend, about 2 hours.. Crush fruit lightly with a wooden spoon. Stir in wine and orange juice. Adjust sweetness as desired.

name: White Peach Sangria

steps: Combine white wine, peach vodka, lemonade concentrate, and sugar in a large pitcher; stir until sugar is dissolved. Add sliced peaches, red grapes, and green grapes.. Refrigerate sangria until well chilled and flavors have blended, at least 2 hours to overnight.. Serve over ice, and use a slotted spoon to include sliced peaches and grapes with each serving.

name: Sangria Cocktail

name: 12 Best Sangria Recipes for Summer Sipping
Watermelon Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cubed watermelon, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'dry white wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vodka'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'triple sec'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'simple syrup'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, cut into wedges'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh blueberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'lime, quartered'}

Pour wine, vodka, triple sec, and simple syrup into the pitcher; stir to combine. Add remaining 3 cups of watermelon cubes, orange sections, blueberries, and lime quarters; chill sangria for 4 hours before serving.

Add additional brandy or orange juice to taste.

name: White Wine and Apple Sangria

name: Peach Sangria

steps: Blend peaches, hot water, brown sugar, and cinnamon in a blender or food processor until smooth. Transfer to a pitcher; stir in dry white wine and triple sec. Cover and chill in refrigerator for at least 4 hours.. Strain peach mixture through a large cheesecloth-lined sieve; squeeze cloth to remove all the juices. Pour juice into a large pitcher; stir in sparkling white wine.

steps: Pour wine and schnapps into a pitcher. Add sugar, peaches, mango, and raspberries and stir gently. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour.

name: Hibiscus Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dried hibiscus petals'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'honey'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon sticks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cardamom'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottles', 'name': 'rose wine'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brandy'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'elderflower syrup'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'triple sec'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Granny Smith apples, cut into chunks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'strawberries, cut into chunks'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'oranges, cut into small chunks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, cut into small chunks'}
steps: Bring water, hibiscus petals, honey, cinnamon sticks, and cardamom to a boil in a large pot. Remove from heat and allow to steep for 1 hour; strain. Stir wine, brandy, brown sugar, elderflower syrup, and triple sec into strained hibiscus water until sugar is dissolved. Add pineapple, apples, strawberries, oranges, and lemon. Refrigerate 8 hours or overnight.

name: Sangria (Red)
ingredients: {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green apple, cored and sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'red wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can or bottle', 'name': 'lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage'}
steps: Stir rum and sugar together in a large pitcher to dissolve the sugar; add apple slices, orange slices, lemon slices, and lime slices.. Crush fruit slightly against the bottom of the pitcher to squeeze some juice into the rum mixture. Pour wine and orange juice into the pitcher; stir. Add lemon-lime soda and stir just before serving.

name: Sheila's Perfect Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'navel oranges, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'pear, cored and chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'kiwi, peeled and sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh strawberries, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(20 ounce) can', 'name': 'pineapple chunks in juice'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Cointreau or other orange liqueur'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white rum'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'coconut-flavored rum'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottles', 'name': 'dry red wine, chilled'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen pink lemonade concentrate, thawed'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon-lime soda, chilled'}
steps: Place the oranges, lemons, limes, pear, kiwi, strawberries, pineapple chunks and juice, and white sugar into a large bowl. Pour the Cointreau, white rum, coconut-flavored rum, and orange juice over the fruit. Stir gently to dissolve the sugar. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours.. Add the red wine, pink lemonade concentrate, lemon juice, and lime juice. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours, or overnight.. Before serving, add the chilled lemon-lime soda. Serve over ice, spooning the fruit into the glass with the liquid. Garnish with an orange slice or maraschino cherries.

name: Fall Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'DeKuyper® Triple Sec'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'dry white wine'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'apple cider'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'apples, cored and diced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'oranges, cut into wedges'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'lemons, cut into wedges'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon sticks'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Ice'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Soda water'}
steps: Add all ingredients except soda water into a large pitcher and stir to combine.. Allow to sit in the refrigerator for 3 to 24 hours.. Pour sangria and fruit into glasses with ice. Top with soda water.

name: Peach-Basil Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'loosely packed fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '3 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'peach nectar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'white wine such as Pinot Grigio'}
steps: In a saucepan, combine the sugar, basil leaves, half of the peach nectar and lemon juice. Bring to a simmer, crushing the basil leaves with the back of a spoon to release their flavor. Simmer just long enough to melt the sugar, then remove from the heat and allow to cool.. Strain the basil mixture into a pitcher filled with ice cubes. Pour in wine and remaining peach nectar. Stir briefly and serve.

name: Easy White Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'white wine'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cubed watermelon'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cubed honeydew'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sliced strawberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh raspberries'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'splashes', 'name': 'ginger ale, or to taste'}
steps: Combine the white wine, watermelon, honeydew, strawberries, and raspberries in a large pitcher. Chill in refrigerator at least 1 hour to allow flavors to combine.. Ladle wine and fruit into wine goblets; top each with a splash of ginger ale to serve.

name: Cha Cha Cha Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'dry white wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'dry red wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sliced fresh peaches'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sliced fresh strawberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'seedless red grapes, halved'}
steps: Combine the sugar, white wine, and red wine in a large bowl and stir for several minutes until the sugar is dissolved. Stir in the sliced orange and lemon. Cover and refrigerate for 4 to 6 hours or overnight.. Stir the mixture and divide it into pitchers. Add the sliced fruit and serve the sangria over ice.

name: Amanda's Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'red wine'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, sliced in rounds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'strawberries, hulled and sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'apple, cored and sliced'}, {'quantity': '9', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'liter', 'name': 'lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage'}
steps: In a large jar or pitcher combine wine and rum with sliced lemon, orange, lime, and strawberry. Push cloves into apples slices and add to mixture. Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight (the longer the better).. To serve, pour a tall glass half-full of wine mixture. Fill the rest of the glass with soda and stir gently. Remove cloves from apple slices and garnish drinks by spooning some marinated fruit into glass.

name: 3 Ways to Make Sangria With Whatever Wine You Like Best
Sangria On The Light Side
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'Juice of 1 orange'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'Juice of 1 lemon'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1.5 liter) bottle', 'name': 'Burgundy or other red wine'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': "Sweet'N Low granulated sugar substitute"}, {'quantity': '3 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'seltzer'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, chilled and cut into wedges'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, chilled and sliced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh strawberry slices'}
steps: In large pitcher or punch bowl, stir together juices, wine, and Sweet 'N Low until Sweet 'N Low dissolves; refrigerate until well chilled. Just before serving, add seltzer, orange wedges, lemon slices, and strawberry slices.

name: Holiday Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'Rioja red wine'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brandy'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '(1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers', 'name': 'orange-flavored liqueur (such as Cointreau®)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'orange'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'grapefruit'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'lemon'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': '1 clove pomander'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice cubes'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'lemon seltzer water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes, sliced'}
steps: Pour Rioja into a large pitcher. Add brandy and orange liqueur. Cut orange, grapefruit, and lemon into wedges. Squeeze juice into the pitcher. Toss in fruit with rinds. Refrigerate until flavors combine, 8 hours to overnight.. Add pomander to the sangria several hours before serving.. Strain liquid into chilled glasses of ice. Top with a splash of seltzer. Garnish with lime slices.

name: Conchi's Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottles', 'name': 'red wine'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and sliced'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'sliced fresh peaches'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bananas, peeled and sliced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon sticks, crushed'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'liters', 'name': 'lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage'}
steps: In a large pitcher, combine red wine, sugar, apples, peaches, bananas and cinnamon sticks. Refrigerate for 6 hours or overnight.. When you're ready to serve, stir in the lemon-lime soda.

name: Cranberry Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cranberry-flavored tea bags'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'fresh lemon'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground ginger'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottles', 'name': 'white wine'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'apples, cored and cut into chunks'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'dried cranberries'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'apple brandy'}
steps: Place the sugar, tea bags, lemon slices, cloves, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, and water into a saucepan, and stir until the sugar has dissolved. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and let mixture cool. Strain out and discard the spices, lemon, and tea bags.. Pour the white wine into a large jar or covered container, and mix with the tea mixture. Stir in apples and cranberries; mix in the apple brandy. Chill in refrigerator 24 to 48 hours. Serve cold.

name: Most Amazing Sangria Recipe Ever!

steps: Stir red wine, ginger ale, orange juice, brandy, triple sec, sugar, cinnamon, and apple together in a large pitcher.. Divide crushed ice evenly into six large wine glasses.. Pour red wine mixture into each wine glass, making sure that each serving has a few pieces of apple.

name: Big Batch Berry Sangria

steps: Mix wine, sodas, simple syrup, orange juice, and brandy together in a large pitcher. Drop in orange slices and some of the frozen berries. Place in the refrigerator for 3 hours.. Pour into glasses and drop in remaining frozen berries instead of ice. Garnish with strawberries.

name: White Sangria with Kiwi

name: The Secret Formula for Perfect Sangria

name: Rosé Wine and Berry Sangria

name: Amazing Peach Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'triple sec'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh peaches - peeled, pitted, and diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'Prosecco, chilled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen seedless grapes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'frozen strawberries'}
steps: Combine triple sec, sugar, and lemon juice in a bowl and stir to dissolve; add peaches. Put in the refrigerator for 8 hours, or overnight.. Pour peach mixture into a pitcher, top with Prosecco, and serve immediately. Garnish each glass with a few frozen grapes and strawberries.

name: Watermelon Rosé Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh strawberries'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'seedless watermelon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 ounce) package', 'name': 'fresh raspberries'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottles', 'name': 'rosé wine'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white vermouth'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'honey'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'sprig', 'name': 'fresh basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) cans', 'name': 'chilled cucumber-flavored sparkling water, or to taste'}
steps: Cut strawberries in half and watermelon into chunks, or use a melon baller.. Combine strawberries, watermelon, and raspberries in a large bowl. Pour rosé, vermouth, and honey into a large pitcher and stir until honey dissolves. Add 1/2 of the fruit and basil. Place pitcher and remaining fruit in a refrigerator for at least 6 hours.. Scoop a large spoonful of cold fruit into the bottom of glasses; add sangria and sparkling cucumber water to taste.

name: Refreshing Peach Sangria

name: Strawberry Sangria

name: Jill's Summer Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottles', 'name': 'red wine'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'orange juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'fresh strawberries, sliced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(20 ounce) can', 'name': 'pineapple chunks in juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(10 ounce) jar', 'name': 'maraschino cherries, drained'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'orange juice'}
steps: In a large pitcher, mix the red wine, 2 cups rum, 2 cups orange juice, and sugar. Refrigerate 8 hours, or overnight.. In a large bowl, mix the strawberries, pineapple chunks, and maraschino cherries. Cover with 2 cups rum and 2 cups orange juice. Refrigerate 8 hours, or overnight.. Drain the fruit (reserve the liquid if desired). Mix the fruit into the pitcher with the sangria to serve.

name: Aldi Has a New Sangria Collection We Plan to Sip All Summer
Red Sangria with Truvia® Natural Sweetener

steps: Spiced Simple Syrup: Place all of the ingredients in a medium saucepot, stir.. Place on high heat, bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer 5 minutes.. Remove from heat, allow to cool completely.. Pour syrup through a strainer to remove spices.. Pour syrup into a jar with lid and store refrigerated. Shake before using.. Sangria: Combine wine, 3/4 cup spiced simple syrup, sparkling water, orange juice, and fruit slices. Stir briskly.. Serve over ice in large red wine glasses.

name: Mr. Big's White Sangria
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'oranges, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'limes, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'tequila'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'trays', 'name': 'ice cubes, or as needed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'dry white wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'champagne'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'club soda'}
steps: Put orange slices, lemon slices, and lime slices in a large punch bowl. Pour sugar over the fruit; add tequila and mix gently with a wooden spoon. Let soak 6 hours to overnight.. Put plenty of ice in the punch bowl. Pour white wine, champagne, and club soda over the ice. Stir and serve immediately.
